PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FurnitureTypeTable
PropertySetDef.Definition: A set of specific properties for furniture type table. HISTORY: First issued in IFC Release R1.5. Renamed from Pset_Table

PropertyDef.Name: WorksurfaceArea
PropertyDef.Definition: The value of the work surface area of the desk..

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfChairs
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum number of chairs that can fit with the table for normal use.
